Text: The author is an idiot, the Soviets lost more people under Stalin all of those that died in in the "Cultural Revolution" of China and Nazi Germany!  And only TWO "human disasters" in the 20th century?  Dropping nuclear weapons on civilians in Japan, keeping millions of Native Palestinians in Concentration Camps by Israeli jews for over 60 years, invading and destroying nearly every country in Central America, Vietnam, Cambodia, Laos...  This guy is an a-hole.
